name: drawing #9
description:
Reference: #97009
Materials and Techniques: drawing on paper, with oil pastel and soft pastel.
Dimensions: 41x29,5cm | 16,1x11,6in

Stylized representation of a feminine figure. The body is drawn in a gradation with oil pastel, while the hair is delineated with contrasting soft pastel.

Signed and dated by the artist.


SHIPPING DETAILS:

The drawing will be properly shipped, protected in a cardboard package.

By default I will ship the item in economy mail, in order to keep shipping costs at a reasonable price. But keep in mind that in this case the package isn't traceable, so I can't be held responsible for the non-delivery.
If you wish, I can ship the item in registered mail. In this case please contact me before the item is shipped.

Shipping costs (economy mail):
Portugal: 1,5€
Europe: 2,5€
Rest of the world: 4€

Shipping costs (registered mail):
Portugal: 2,5€
Europe: 5€
Rest of the world: 6€

For further information please feel free to contact me.
